QC.Met01.hint: The two formats for software citation supported by SQAaaS
are: 1) CodeMeta and 2) Citation File Format (CFF). While
CodeMeta provides you with a more comprehensive description,
CFF is a more lightweight, good-enough approach to software
(and supported by GitHub) citation. Both provide tools to
easily generate a working citation file. Once having the
file, be sure to add it to the root path of your code repo.
